User Guide¶

This guide is a resource for using the Allen Wrench package. It is maintained by the Allen Institute for Brain Science.

Quick Start Install Using Pip (Linux)¶

  1. Pip install for a single user.

    pip install http://bamboo.corp.alleninstitute.org/browse/MAT-AWBS/latestSuccessful/artifact/shared/tgz/allen_wrench-0.1.1.tar.gz --user

Install Using Setup Tools¶

  1. Download the distribution.

    wget http://bamboo.corp.alleninstitute.org/browse/MAT-AWBS/latestSuccessful/artifact/shared/tgz/allen_wrench-0.1.1.tar.gz

  2. Unpack the distribution.

    tar xvzf allen_wrench-0.1.1.tar.gz

  3. Install using setuptools

    cd allen_wrench-0.1.1
python setup.py install --user

Uninstall¶

  1. Simply use pip.

    pip uninstall allen_wrench

Other Distribution Formats¶

  • allen_wrench-0.1.1.tar.gz
  • allen_wrench-0.1.1.tar.bz2
  • allen_wrench-0.1.1.zip

Required Dependencies¶

  • NumPy
  • SciPy
  • MatPlotLib

Optional Dependencies¶

  • NEURON
  • pandas and pytables for loading and saving configuration tables.
  • mpi4py is a message passing interface for distributed processing
  • nose is nicer testing for python
